item.title: Introduction to Python and R
item.description: Hey friends. Today, I wanted to talk about two coding languages I learned in my Computational Biology course in Spring 2021. R The first language I learned was R, which I had past familiarity with. R is useful for data analysis and working with large data sets. I actually use R frequently in my research lab where we study gut and vaginal microbiomes. You can check out two projects I did using R, under “Projects” in the navigation bar.
